Module.Content: <head> <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript" src="/portal/js/jquery-1.10.2.js"></script> <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript" src="js/list.js"></script> <head> <body> <select id="fruitList"> <option>Select fruits</option> <option>Apple</option> <option>Orange</option> <option>Strawberry</option> <option>Pineapple</option> <option>Grapes</option> <option>Mango</option> </select> </body>
